TEXT.TITLE: FIRST CITY INDUSTRIES INC <FCY> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Opoer shr profit 17 cts vs loss 96 cts Oper net profit 2,293,000 vs loss 7,110,000 Sales 116.0 mln vs 108.3 mln Year Oper shr loss 2.03 dlrs vs loss 2.12 dlrs Oper net loss 13.8 mln vs loss 11.6 mln Sales 454.0 mln vs 446.4 mln NOTE: Net excludes gains from discontinued operations of 10.2 mln dlrs vs 1,985,000 dlrs in quarter and 4,262,000 dlrs vs 1,320,000 dlrs in year.
